cst8284.asgmt3.landRegistry

Class RegControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • cst8284.asgmt3.landRegistry.RegControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RegControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements the real action in land registry application including ArrayList methods, Utility methods, Controller methods and method test that throws exception
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Thi Kim Anh Huynh
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • isValidRegNum

        public static boolean isValidRegNum(java.lang.String num)
        This is the method test for bad registrant input. This will check the registrant number that user enter is correct form or not. It has to contain number only, not any character.
        Parameters:
        num - the registrant number that user input
        Returns:
        true if the registrant number format is correct

      • isRegsAvailable

        public static boolean isRegsAvailable(RegControl reg)
        This is the method test for bad registrant input. This will check whether the registrant number is available or not.
        Parameters:
        reg - the registrant number that user input
        Returns:
        true if the registrant number exits

      • isRegExists

        public static boolean isRegExists(int num,
                                  RegControl reg)
        This is the method test for bad registrant input. This will check whether the registrants has the registrant number or not.
        Parameters:
        num - the registrant number that user input
        reg - the registrant of the registrant list
        Returns:
        true if registrant has that registration number

      • isPropOverlap

        public static boolean isPropOverlap(Property prop,
                                    RegControl reg)
        This is the method test for bad property input. This will check that whether the property is overlap or not.
        Parameters:
        prop - the property that user enter
        reg - the property of the property list
        Returns:
        true if the property is not overlap

      • isPropSizeAvaiable

        public static boolean isPropSizeAvaiable(Property prop)
        This is the method test for bad property input. This will check if the property size meets the condition or not, returns the right and the bottom of property.
        Parameters:
        prop - the property that user input
        Returns:
        true if the right and the bottom of property is less or equal to 1000

      • isPropertyMinimumSize

        public static boolean isPropertyMinimumSize(Property prop)
        This is the method test for bad property input. This will check if the property size meets the condition or not, returns the length and the width of property.
        Parameters:
        prop - the property that user input
        Returns:
        true if the length property is more than 20m and the width of propery is more than 10m

      • isContainTwoParts

        public static boolean isContainTwoParts(java.lang.String[] string)
        This is the method test for bad general input. This will check to see whether the input that user enter from first name, last name, regNum, or property coordinate is missing or not.
        Parameters:
        string - the input that user enter from first name, last name, regNum, or property coordinate
        Returns:
        true if the input from user is correct form, which has the size of two words/numbers.

      • isNullValue

        public static boolean isNullValue(java.lang.String string)
        This is the method test for bad general input. This will check to see whether the user enter value from first name, last name, regNum, or property coordinate or not.
        Parameters:
        string - the input that user enter from first name, last name, regNum, or property coordinate
        Returns:
        true if the input of user meets requirements, which means that the input can not be null or just white spaces.

      • addNewRegistrant

        public Registrant addNewRegistrant(Registrant reg)
        This is the method to allow user add new registrant.
        Parameters:
        reg - the new registrant is added
        Returns:
        the new registrant

      • findRegistrant

        public Registrant findRegistrant(int regNum)
        This is the method to find registrant by registrant number. This will check whether the new registrant number is the same as any registrant number of exist registrant, as well as the requirement format of user input.
        Parameters:
        regNum - the new registrant number that user enter
        Returns:
        the registrant if the new registrant number is same as any registrant number of exist registrant
        Throws:
        BadLandRegistryException - if the input of user (check isValidRegNum, isRegsAvailable, isRegExists) is invalid

      • listOfRegistrants

        public java.util.ArrayList<Registrant> listOfRegistrants()
        This methods is list of all registrants.
        Returns:
        the list of all registrants.

      • deleteRegistrant

        public Registrant deleteRegistrant(int regNum)
        This method is allow user delete registrant by using the exit registrant number. This will check the requirement format of user input.
        Parameters:
        regNum - the registrant number that user enter
        Returns:
        the new registrant list, which is no longer have the previous delete one.
        Throws:
        BadLandRegistryException - if the input of user (check isValidRegNum, isRegsAvailable, isRegExists) is invalid

      • addNewProperty

        public Property addNewProperty(Property prop)
        This is the method to allow user add new property if the new property is not overlap with the exit one. This will check the requirement format of user input as well.
        Parameters:
        prop - the new property is added
        Returns:
        the new property added
        Throws:
        BadLandRegistryException - if the input of user (check isPropOverlap, isPropSizeAvaiable, isPropertyMinimumSize) is invalid

      • deleteProperties

        public boolean deleteProperties(java.util.ArrayList<Property> deleteList)
        This method allows user delete property.
        Parameters:
        deleteList - the list of property that need to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if the deletList is deleted successfully

      • changePropertyRegistrant

        public java.util.ArrayList<Property> changePropertyRegistrant(java.util.ArrayList<Property> oldRegNumPropertyArrayList,
                                                              int newRegNum)
        This method allows user change the original registrant number to the new one. This will check the requirement format of user input as well.
        Parameters:
        oldRegNumPropertyArrayList - the original registrant number
        newRegNum - the new registrant number
        Returns:
        the new registrant number, which has replaced in all affected properties
        Throws:
        BadLandRegistryException - if the input of user (check isValidRegNum, isRegsAvailable, isRegExists) is invalid

      • listOfAllProperties

        public java.util.ArrayList<Property> listOfAllProperties()
        This method list of all properties in the list
        Returns:
        the list of all properties

      • listOfProperties

        public java.util.ArrayList<Property> listOfProperties(int regNum)
        This method allows user to display only the property with specific regNum. This will check the requirement format of user input as well.
        Parameters:
        regNum - the registrant number that user want to display properties
        Returns:
        the list of property with specific regNum
        Throws:
        BadLandRegistryException - if the input of user (check isValidRegNum, isRegsAvailable, isRegExists) is invalid

      • saveToFile

                              java.lang.String fileName)
        This method will receive the ArrayList and saves the ArrayList to file
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of ArrayList
        Parameters:
        source - the source that is going to be saved
        fileName - the name of the file to be saved
        Returns:
        true if the file saves successful

      • loadFromFile

        This method loads the program of user input from file
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of ArrayList
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file to be loaded
        Returns:
        the file that loads successful

      • refreshProperties

        public void refreshProperties()
        This method is clear the properties first, then add all properties in RegView.PROPERTIES_FILE from load from file.

      • refreshRegistrants

        public void refreshRegistrants()
        This method is clear the registrants first, then add all registrants in RegView.REGISTRANTS_FILE from load from file.
